apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this tender emoji portrays a loving couple consisting of two women, one with no discernible skin tone and the other with a medium-dark skin tone, united by a vibrant, softly shaded heart. The heart gleams with realistic lighting, a hallmark of Apple's design, suggesting deep connection and romance. The figures are rendered with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and rounded forms, conveying warmth and inclusivity in expressions of love and partnership.
